en: M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, 1788, 75.5 x 63 cm.  The Wallace Collection. (6215x5951px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, reverse image.  The Wallace Collection. (7491x5619px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph showing a damage at the left edge of the panel where the sealing layer can be seen.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from black drapery at lower edge. Above the light grey ground is a thin layer containing Prussian blue, followed by two further grey layers, presumably related to the underlying white drapery.  This is covered with a stroke of black paint.  The Wallace Collection. (1764x4164px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from black drapery at lower edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1764x4164px)

M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from the the left edge. Layer structure includes sealing layers on the panel, ground, three layers of blue/grey paint containing mixtures of lead white, smalt, Prussian blue and bone black, followed by pink paint in two layers all depicting the sky. The upper layer of mixed brown paint relates to the foliage of the tree.  The Wallace Collection. (2052x4164px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from the the left edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (2052x4164px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic).  The Wallace Collection. (9281x7818px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, infrared reflectogram (OSIRIS).  The Wallace Collection. (3884x3364px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, infrared reflectogram (OSIRIS). Contrast adjusted to show more detail in darks.  The Wallace Collection. (3884x3364px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of the sitter's mouth.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of the sitter's nose.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of the sitter's earing.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of area where drapery crosses onto sitter’s arm showing wet in wet application.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of edge of ruffle at the sitter's elbow.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of ribbon on sitter's bodice.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of the pearl bracelet.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of foliage in the background showing cracking and liquid appearance of paint beneath the varnish.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of foliage in the background showing paint emerging from the cracks onto the surface.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of foliage in the background showing rough edged cracks and paint emerging onto the surface.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of foliage in the background showing a wide crack with multiple edges formed as the paint has continued to contract.   The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)

M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, photomicrograph of foliage in the background showing cracking and a hole or bubble in the paint layer with the pale ground layer visible around the edge.  The Wallace Collection. (3102x4146px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from background foliage at the top edge.  The Wallace Collection. (1704x4164px)
M1382: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Mrs Jane Braddyll, paint cross-section from background foliage at the top edge, ultraviolet fluorescence image.  The Wallace Collection. (1704x4164px)
